text: Carla Panerai (born 4 July 1947) is a retired Italian sprinter who won the 80 hurdles at the 1967 Mediterranean Games. She competed in this event at the 1968 Olympics but failed to reach the final. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female hurdlers Category:Olympic athletes of Italy Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Mediterranean Games gold medalists for Italy Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1967 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in athletics
title: Carla Panerai
